website_summaries.verdict: This fun-colored ball is intended for smaller children to use for splashball, a simpler version of water polo.
pros: Perfect for pre-teens with smaller hands
cons: For older elementary or middle school children, consider a larger size

customer_reviews.title: nice but not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: i was thinking this was the size of a waterpolo ball but it is not. it was my fault as i did not put two and two together as this is a "splash" ball for playing "splash ball" an easier version of waterpolo for kids. but that was my intent in the beginning to get a inexpensive ball my kids could play with along with myself. not smaller but inexpensive so it could be played with roughly. but i am pleased with this, it has great grip and is perfect for small kids hands. so, i will give it to them and find myself a different practice ball.
customer_reviews.author: John Mauceri

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice water-polo ball for kids. It's the official "Splashball" size, and is perfect for pre-teen kids with smaller hands. I looked into one of the many other sizes available, but this size really is fine for bigger kids. It has a very grippy surface when wet. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: hdtvguy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Won’t hold any air overnight. It needs to be re pumped everyday! My daughter likes the colors though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Redbord

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: Good water polo ball for a smaller kid, eg, 5 - 8 years old. Good with smaller hands and excellent grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Caper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for introducing-taching kids
customer_reviews.text: I've played water polo since 1996 and coached for many years later in life. This is a great ball for kids. I'm ordering another right now for my boys. The smaller blue ones are good for smaller toddlers like 2/3 too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for the two year old youngster
customer_reviews.text: Nothing needs to be said. It is perfect for the two year old youngster.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Y. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the young Waterpolo player
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for little hands, learning how to hold and throw the ball! We bought this for our 5 and 7 yr old boys and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gurr

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted, perfect size for our 4 and 7 year old boys and great quality - they love it!
customer_reviews.author: morourke

customer_reviews.title: Ball is cute and well made but very small
customer_reviews.text: Cute ball but I had no idea how small it was. This is a tiny ball. If you're looking for a ball for a pretty young child, this is it. If your kid is a teenager or a preteen, you may want to go a couple sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ball size
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why "ball size' isn't listed and referred to in inches or centimeters diameter instead of "Size 1" or "splash ball". Those last two terms are not informative for those not intimately familiar with water polo. It is apparent from other reviews that it is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

product_meta.title: Mikasa Sports Youth Unisex Splashball Water Polo Balls
product_meta.description: The Mikasa USA Water Polo Splashball is a member of Mikasa' s Varsity Series This Water Polo Splash Ball is approved by USA Water Polo and is designed for children ages 8 and under Buffed for maximum grip this Water Polo will stay in their little hands without slipping wildly
